DOC.brief_summary: This is a longitudinal study in patients with Parkinson's Disease (PD) carriers of a genetic mutation - substitution of gly with ser in position 2019 (G2019S) in the leucine-rich repeat kinase 2 (LRRK2) gene. The purpose of this study is to explore the association between genetic mutations in the known genes and their influence on disease manifestation over few years of follow up
DOC.brief_title: A Longitudinal Study in Parkinson's Disease (PD) Patients
DOC.criteria: parkinson'd disease patients that already participated in a pasr cross sectional study subjects with cognitive decline by the parameters defined in Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM) IV subjects with psychiatric disorder subjects unable to sign a consent form
